scripts.build: npx turbo run build && docker compose build
scripts.dev: docker compose up -d && npx turbo run dev --filter=@conflixis/ui --filter=@conflixis/core
scripts.dev:manager: docker compose up -d manager api portal core_db reference_db postgrest && npx turbo run dev --filter=@conflixis/ui --filter=@conflixis/core
scripts.build:api: npx turbo run build --filter=@conflixis/api && docker compose build api
scripts.dev:api: docker compose up -d api && npx turbo run dev --filter=@conflixis/api
scripts.db:reset:core: docker compose stop core_db && docker compose rm -f core_db && docker volume rm conflixis-engine_core-postgres-data && docker compose up -d --build core_db
